TopicTitle: OMG PLEASE ..., SOMEBODY HELP ME!!!, When on launch pad screen goes black.

Articles.Content: Ok this is really getting frustrating, I have ksp v1.0.4 modded, and after spending quite some time building a rocket when i go to launch the rocket, the screen switches to the space screen as if i have already launched and I'm in orbit. The problem is i didnt launch anything it wont let me. The nav ball remains on the screen as well as the other instruments which are fully functional. The rocket wont launch, you cant launch it. after the problem occurs i restarted the game, the computer, hell i even reinstalled probley 15 times each time adding mods in different order to narrow the problem down. I love the game and i really want to continue playing, there has to be a fix for this annoying problem, please somebody help me!!!!!!!!!:mad::mad:

Ok this is really getting frustrating, I have ksp v1.0.4 modded, and after spending quite some time building a rocket when i go to launch the rocket, the screen switches to the space screen as if i have already launched and I'm in orbit. The problem is i didnt launch anything it wont let me. The nav ball remains on the screen as well as the other instruments which are fully functional. The rocket wont launch, you cant launch it. after the problem occurs i restarted the game, the computer, hell i even reinstalled probley 15 times each time adding mods in different order to narrow the problem down. I love the game and i really want to continue playing, there has to be a fix for this annoying problem, please somebody help me!!!!!!!!!:mad::mad:

Just happened to me too! I tried a plane though and was using stock docking ports inside planes cargo hold to do a capsule drop test.
